languages.text: Собирая воедино истекающие кровью миры, Вольный Торговец сурово наводил{mf||а} порядок, защищая веру и изгоняя в прошлое времена, когда Простор мнил себя неподвластным Его правосудию. Началась экспансия, которая со временем должна была превратить сектор в новую провинцию Империума, более не нуждающуюся в Вольных Торговцах.

Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader restored order in the Expanse without compromise, protecting the faith and leaving behind any notion that the region could ever be beyond His righteous justice. An expansion began that would slowly turn the sector into a new province of the Imperium, where Rogue Traders were no longer needed.
languages.original_text: Собирая воедино истекающие кровью миры, Вольный Торговец сурово наводил{mf||а} порядок, защищая веру и изгоняя в прошлое времена, когда Простор мнил себя неподвластным Его правосудию. Началась экспансия, которая со временем должна была превратить сектор в новую провинцию Империума, более не нуждающуюся в Вольных Торговцах.

traits.locale_text: Gathering bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader adamantly restored order, protecting the faith and leaving behind in the past the times, when the Expanse felt that it could be beyond His righteous justice. A slow process of building the dominion, that in time should turn the sector into a new Imperium province, having no need for Rogue Traders any more.

Gathering bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader adamantly restored order, protecting the faith and leaving behind in the past the times, when the Expanse felt that it could be beyond His righteous justice. A slow process of building the dominion, that in time should turn the sector into a new Imperium province, having no need for Rogue Traders any more.

Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader restored order in the Expanse without compromise, protecting the faith and leaving behind any notion that the region could ever be beyond His righteous justice. The expansion began that would slowly turn the sector into a new province of the Imperium, where Rogue Traders were no longer needed.

Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader restored order in the Expanse without compromise, protecting the faith and leaving behind any notion that the region could ever be beyond His righteous justice. The expansion began that would slowly turn the sector into a new province of the Imperium, where Rogue Traders were no longer needed.

Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader restored order in the Expanse without compromise, protecting the faith and leaving behind any notion that the region could ever be beyond His righteous justice. An expansion began that would slowly turn the sector into a new province of the Imperium, where Rogue Traders were no longer needed.

Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader restored order in the Expanse without compromise, protecting the faith and leaving behind any notion that the region could ever be beyond His righteous justice. An expansion began that would slowly turn the sector into a new province of the Imperium, where Rogue Traders were no longer needed.

languages.text: 行商浪人将饱受摧残的世界重新团结起来，以绝不妥协的信念重整了秩序，维护了信仰。科罗努斯扩区自以为可以无视帝皇的正义，而如今，这样的时代已成为过去。大扩张开始了，科罗努斯扩区会逐步变为帝国新的星区。届时，这片星区便不再需要行商浪人的存在了。
languages.original_text: Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader restored order in the Expanse without compromise, protecting the faith and leaving behind any notion that the region could ever be beyond His righteous justice. An expansion began that would slowly turn the sector into a new province of the Imperium, where Rogue Traders were no longer needed.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人将饱受摧残的世界重新团结起来，以绝不妥协的信念重整了秩序，维护了信仰。科罗努斯扩区自以为可以无视帝皇的正义，而如今，这样的时代已成为过去。大扩张开始了，科罗努斯扩区会逐步变为帝国新的星区。届时，这片星区便不再需要行商浪人的存在了。

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} klaubte die blutenden Welten der Ausdehnung wieder auf und stellte kompromisslos die Ordnung wieder her. Er beschützte den Glauben und zerschlug jeden Gedanken daran, dass die Region jemals vor seiner rechtschaffenen Gerechtigkeit sicher sein könnte. Es begann die Expansion, die den Sektor langsam in eine neue Provinz des Imperiums verwandeln sollte, in der keine Freihändler mehr nötig waren.
languages.original_text: Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader restored order in the Expanse without compromise, protecting the faith and leaving behind any notion that the region could ever be beyond His righteous justice. An expansion began that would slowly turn the sector into a new province of the Imperium, where Rogue Traders were no longer needed.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} klaubte die blutenden Welten der Ausdehnung wieder auf und stellte kompromisslos die Ordnung wieder her. Er beschützte den Glauben und zerschlug jeden Gedanken daran, dass die Region jemals vor seiner rechtschaffenen Gerechtigkeit sicher sein könnte. Es begann die Expansion, die den Sektor langsam in eine neue Provinz des Imperiums verwandeln sollte, in der keine Freihändler mehr nötig waren.

languages.text: Rassemblant de nouveau ses mondes exsangues, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} rétablit l'ordre dans les Étendues, protégeant la foi sans accepter le moindre compromis et contredisant les théories affirmant que cette région ne pourrait jamais être soumise à la justice de l'Empereur. L'expansion qui en résulta transforma lentement le secteur en une nouvelle province de l'Imperium où les libres-marchands n'étaient plus nécessaires.
languages.original_text: Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader restored order in the Expanse without compromise, protecting the faith and leaving behind any notion that the region could ever be beyond His righteous justice. An expansion began that would slowly turn the sector into a new province of the Imperium, where Rogue Traders were no longer needed.

traits.locale_text: Rassemblant de nouveau ses mondes exsangues, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} rétablit l'ordre dans les Étendues, protégeant la foi sans accepter le moindre compromis et contredisant les théories affirmant que cette région ne pourrait jamais être soumise à la justice de l’Empereur. L'expansion qui en résulta transforma lentement le secteur en une nouvelle province de l'Imperium où les libres-marchands n'étaient plus nécessaires.

languages.text: Con sus mundos ensangrentados unificados de nuevo, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente restauró el orden en la Extensión sin excepciones, protegiendo a los devotos y dejando obsoletas las creencias de que la región podía estar más allá de Su justicia. Dio comienzo un proceso de expansión que convertiría lentamente el sector en una nueva provincia del Imperium en la que ya no sería necesaria la presencia de los Comerciantes Independientes.
languages.original_text: Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader restored order in the Expanse without compromise, protecting the faith and leaving behind any notion that the region could ever be beyond His righteous justice. An expansion began that would slowly turn the sector into a new province of the Imperium, where Rogue Traders were no longer needed.

traits.locale_text: Con sus mundos ensangrentados unificados de nuevo, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente restauró el orden en la Extensión sin excepciones, protegiendo a los devotos y dejando obsoletas las creencias de que la región podía estar más allá de Su justicia. Dio comienzo un proceso de expansión que convertiría lentamente el sector en una nueva provincia del Imperium en la que ya no sería necesaria la presencia de los Comerciantes Independientes.

languages.text: 悲痛にあえぐ世界をいま一度束ねることで、自由開拓者はエクスパンスに秩序を取り戻した。信仰は守られ、この地が陛下の公正な正義を脅かしえるなどと考える余地はどこにもなかった。発展が始まったことでこの地域は帝国の新たな領州へとゆっくりと姿を変えていき、自由開拓者の存在はもはや必要とされなくなった。
languages.original_text: Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader restored order in the Expanse without compromise, protecting the faith and leaving behind any notion that the region could ever be beyond His righteous justice. An expansion began that would slowly turn the sector into a new province of the Imperium, where Rogue Traders were no longer needed.

traits.locale_text: 悲痛にあえぐ世界をいま一度束ねることで、自由開拓者はエクスパンスに秩序を取り戻した。信仰は守られ、この地が陛下の公正な正義を脅かしえるなどと考える余地はどこにもなかった。発展が始まったことでこの地域は帝国の新たな領州へとゆっくりと姿を変えていき、自由開拓者の存在はもはや必要とされなくなった。

languages.text: Can vermek üzere olan dünyalarını yeniden bir araya getiren Hür Tacir, Enginlik'teki düzeni tavizsiz bir şekilde yeniden sağladı, inananları koruma altına aldı ve bölgenin, O'nun ilahi adaletinden uzaklaşabileceğine dair her türlü düşünceyi bertaraf etti. Başlayan genişleme girişimi sonucunda sektörün İmparatorluk'un vilayetlerinden birine dönüşmesi, Hür Tacirlere duyulan ihtiyacı ortadan kaldırdı.
languages.original_text: Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader restored order in the Expanse without compromise, protecting the faith and leaving behind any notion that the region could ever be beyond His righteous justice. An expansion began that would slowly turn the sector into a new province of the Imperium, where Rogue Traders were no longer needed.

traits.locale_text: Can vermek üzere olan dünyalarını yeniden bir araya getiren Hür Tacir, Enginlik'teki düzeni tavizsiz bir şekilde yeniden sağladı, inananları koruma altına aldı ve bölgenin, O'nun ilahi adaletinden uzaklaşabileceğine dair her türlü fikri bertaraf etti. Bir genişleme başlatıldı ve sektör, İmparatorluk'un vilayetlerinden biri hâline geldi, Hür Tacirlere de ihtiyaç kalmadı.
